title:
Azide modification forming luminescent sp2 defects on single-walled
  carbon nanotubes for near-infrared defect photoluminescence
authors:
Keita Hayashi, Yoshiaki Niidome, Tamehito Shiga, Boda Yu, Yasuto
  Nakagawa, Dawid Janas, Tsuyohiko Fujigaya, Tomohiro Shiraki
abstract:
Azide functionalization produced luminescent sp2-type defects on
single-walled carbon nanotubes, by which defect photoluminescence appeared in
near infrared regions (1116 nm). Changes in exciton properties were induced by
localization effects at the defect sites, creating exciton-engineered
nanomaterials based on the defect structure design.
